original_title: World War Dead: Rise of the Fallen
overview: To celebrate the centenary of WW1, a TV Documentary team travels to the Somme to put together a ratings smash about new mysteries relating to the famous battle. However, what they unearth is far from a new story of those that died 100 years ago â€“ but an army of the undead and a brand new war.
title: World War Dead: Rise of the Fallen
